post_text: May 19, 2020 at 1:52â€¯PM#1Hi all,I know that ein can run or skip a line in a macro by setting a variable to a certain value. Is there a way to run/skip a line checking multible variables? Like run this line if $Var1 == 1 and $Var2 == 0?CheersKunstLichtSchalterRUN DMX
title: Running Macro lines depending on multible variables
